org.lukep.javavis.program.generic.helpers
Class ModelSerializer

java.lang.Object
  org.lukep.javavis.program.generic.helpers.ModelSerializer

public class ModelSerializer
extends java.lang.Object

Serialises a project to file using XStreamer or Java's bog standard Serialization API. It can also GZIP stuff too. Cool!
